author: Brenda Stolyar
title: Down Dog app review: At-home yoga for people who are easily bored
description: Work(out) From Home is a weekly column where we review smart fitness machines and apps in the wake of the coronavirus outbreak. Thanks to technology, there are still plenty of ways to exercise if your gym is closed. Down Dog Yoga The Good Easy to follow along…
